long_description: This Topeak RideCase is designed specifically for the iPhone 5, providing protection for your device while letting you easily and securely mount it to your bike's handlebar. 2-piece case has a rigid, protective back paired with a clear window that maintains touchscreen performance while adding weather resistance. Case back has opening for unrestricted camera use. Included Topeak RideCase mounting system allows installation on handlebar, stem or stem cap (stem cap mounting is intended for use with 1-1/8 in. threadless setups).
short_description: This Topeak RideCase is designed specifically for the iPhone 5, providing protection for your device while letting you easily and securely mount it to your bike's handlebar.
